text: allāhviṉ mītu kaṟpaṉaiyākap poy kūṟupavarkaḷ, maṟumai nāḷaip paṟṟi eṉṉa eṇṇukiṉṟaṉar? (Atu poyyeṉa eṇṇik koṇṭaṉarā?) Niccayamāka allāh maṉitarkaḷ mītu perum kirupaiyuṭaiyavaṉ. (Avvāṟu illaiyeṉil avarkaḷai uṭaṉukkuṭaṉ taṇṭittiruppāṉ.) Ivvāṟiruntum avarkaḷil palar avaṉukku naṉṟi celuttuvatillai
